Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Michigan/Wabash
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wabash.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
